a_dollar_a_dime.description: Increases the melon sell price by 0.25.

doubled_city_funding.description: Gold put into the city bank is now doubled.

guaranteed_returns.description: Citizens are guaranteed to get gold from selling to the merchant, as well as getting more gold than usual.

better_farmers.description: Breaking melons will break all adjacent melons.

blast_protection.description: Gives the monarch more armor and protection against explosives.

overclock_teleporter.description: Powering the teleporter will now give it three charges.

strict_trade_laws.description: Slows down the speed of imports by 50%, caps them at 30, and makes them 50% less likely to contain contraband.

bigger_bunker.description: Expands the underground bunker, also adding another area to get upgrades in.

load_cannons.description: Adds a button to the bunker that lets the monarch fire an aerial cannon.

floating_islands.description: Adds 4 floating islands and a launchpad on one of the houses, adding 3 new areas to get upgrades in.

faster_selling.description: Allows players to sneak while selling to quintuple speed.

lower_shipping_taxes.description: Increases the melon sell price by 0.3.

even_better_harvesting.description: Increases melons per melon from 3-7 to 5-9.

island_skylights.description: Adds a bunch of lanterns around the floating islands.

farming_island.description: Unlocks the second island, also allowing the farm on it to generate melons.

deluxe_sky_farm.description: Increases sky melon spawn rate by 150%.

quality_control.description: Increases the melon sell price by 0.5.

better_filters.description: Increases the melon sell price by 0.2.

defender_island.description: Unlocks the third island, this one containing a small floating castle.

public_executions.description: Allows players to be executed by popular vote.

iron_skin.description: You now need a wooden sword to attack the guards or the monarch.

projectile_protection.description: The monarch gets leggings that will protect them from projectiles.

pricey_gunpowder.description: Makes grenades cost 8 gold instead of 4 and makes them recharge slower.

the_grand_finale.description: Unlocks the final island. You pretty much won the game.
